attributes.action: I would like the government to make dyslexia test & Autism test on the NHS
attributes.additional_details: I am a mother to three children one of my children as diagnosis of ASD ADHD sensory processing disorder. I have had to fight hard to get my daughter the support she needs with her diagnosis as school always come back to me about funding. in the end, I paid for my daughter to be seen privately. I now have been told that my daughter is showing strong signs of being dyslexic and i will now have to pay again for a diagnois There are many families out there on low income and not able to pay for this.
attributes.background: I want the government to give schools more funding to help their students to get assessed for dyslexia to help them get the highest education so children feel they have the ability to leave school with the grands to say they would like to become a Dr, nurse, work in law.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Increase funding for autism/ADHD assessments to reduce waiting times'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640581

'Fund screening for Autism, ADHD and Dyspraxia in all primary schools'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635256

'Fund free Diagnostic Assessments for Dyslexia for all Children aged 7-19'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635682
